title: Looking for an ADC, Jungler and Support (Also subs) for a silver team. WA players most pref
body:
Both me and my mate are quite sick of soloq and want to start a ranked 5's team. Want WA players mostly cause it makes finding a time to play easier when we're all from the same timezone. If you're interested leave below
Summoner Name:
Age:
Rank:
Role:
Champ Pool (for that role):
Preferred Comms (eg: Skype/TS/Curse Voice):

tyvm

replies.body:
Hey man
Summoner name: SAP Herbie
AGE: 15
Rank: Bronze 2 ( recentlly played adc for a plat team but we happened to split up, also won lots of tournaments)
Role: ADC
Champion Pool: Corki, Jinx, Trist ( try to plat the meta but i am quite the corki/trist and i am also good at jinx)
Get in touch with me on the rift and i will hopefully see you soon.
PS: The team i was recentlly with thought i deserved gold so techniclly i should be at least silver not bronze :P

Hey Man, Me and a mate are in the same situation. Just to say we are a bot lane duo and work well together. :D

Summoner Name: Power Mav
Age: 21
Rank: Silver 3
Role: ADC
Champ Pool (for that role): Basically Every ADC. Happy to download anything.


Summoner Name: Calvin
Age: 19
Rank: Bronze 2 (Decayed from Silver 5 due to Family issues)
Role: Support
Champ Pool (for that role): Leona, Nami, Sona, Taric. But is good at everything.

We both have a 1000 plus wins on normals so we have a fair idea what we are doing just haven't been bothered to actually play ranked

If you guys are committed enough to join the Oceanic open ladder, I'd be down to trial.

Summoner Name: lKakao (Yes, that's an L)
Age: 16
Rank: Silver V
Role: AD carry, but can play anything required.
Champ Pool (for that role): Lucian, Corki, Vayne, Twitch, Jinx, Graves and going to learn Kalista.
Preferred Comms (eg: Skype/TS/Curse Voice): I've got them all.

*Edit - I just got back from holidays, that's why I have not been playing much. Looking to play a hell of a lot per day to improve myself as a player.*

19
Gold III
Top/AD Carry
Every Champion
TS/CV

I live in Antarctica though.

yo iam from QLD but iam on every day all different times and and looking for a active team to join.

MrAwesomeOne
27
Silver 4
Support or top
i can play just about all champs but main: leona, thresh, braum, blitz, for support, and top: daruis, aatrox, garen, teemo, ryze, sej
comms, i got skype and curse but i can get other apps if u want me to.

hope to hear from u

I'm not in silver or even lvl 30 but I'm a good adc as its my main I'm lvl 21 on my way to lvl 30 quick and with a regular team it would be easy. Ingame name is "Badsalt" and I am in WA Perth. My age is 15, my most played champs for adc are: corki, Ashe, jinx,, trist and misfortune. Preferred communication is skype but I'm cool with everything, Thanks
